HOURS.DESCRIPTION: These are the opening hours that your premises adheres to. This can be helpful for users to see when you are open.

TABLES.DESCRIPTION: These are the tables in your premises that customers can scan into and order drinks to. Users will be able to see the name that you give to each table.

MENUS.DESCRIPTION: Menus are used to display to your offerings to users. You can have multiple menus and have them active at different times.
